# Game of Life // Author: Ronald Ip
# Input File
# 
# Please read and follow the instructions below.
# 
# Lines beginning with #, or are empty, are ignored.
# 
# Enter the puzzle input, one line per row, one digit per column.
# Empty lines will be ignored.
# 
# Use '1' for living organisms, '0' for null or dead organisms.
# 
# Ensure that input forms either a square or a rectangle.
#
# Example (3x3 grid): 
# 010
# 000
# 010
#
# Example (3x4 grid): 
# 0100
# 0000
# 0100

# Gosper glider gun (9 x 37)
000000000000000000000000100000000000
000000000000000000000010100000000000
000000000000110000001100000000000011
000000000001000100001100000000000011
110000000010000010001100000000000000
110000000010001011000010100000000000
000000000010000010000000100000000000
000000000001000100000000000000000000
000000000000110000000000000000000000
000000000000000000000000000000000000
000000000000000000000000000000000000
#000000000000000000000000000000000000

# Oscillators
#00000
#00100
#00100
#00100
#00000
